extendedInfo.description: Make reviewing essential physical therapy academic content enjoyable! Physical Therapy Content Master is designed to assist physical therapists to possess full command of core academic content. Physical Therapy Content Master is an ideal tool for physical therapy students, recent physical therapy graduates, and licensed physical therapists. The academic content is organized into ten unique system and non-system categories. Musculoskeletal System Neuromuscular System Cardiopulmonary System Integumentary System Other Systems Equipment and Devices Therapeutic Modalities Safety and Professional Roles Teaching and Learning Research and Evidence-Based Practice Therapists can review selected content by scrolling through subcategories in each of the system and non-system categories or elect to review content in a random mode. Frequent review of essential academic content allows therapists to successfully convert the information to long term memory. Physical Therapy Content Master includes an assessment mode that consists of 750 multiple-choice questions. The multiple-choice questions are designed to assess a therapists mastery of the information presented in the content review mode. The number of questions in each category varies from a minimum of 25 to a maximum of 125. Therapists can elect to take examinations in a specific category (e.g., musculoskeletal system) or in a random mode. A formal score report describes a therapistâs level of mastery in each of the ten system and non-system categories. Company Information Scorebuilders is the recognized market leader in licensing preparation for the National Physical Therapy Examination. Our product line consists of review books, two day review courses, web based comprehensive exams, flash cards, and iPhone applications. Scorebuilders has assisted students to pass the National Physical Therapy Examination on their first attempt for over 20 years. Timely updates and clinically oriented questions have resulted in our products being recommended by faculty and students throughout the country. Copyright Â© 2013 Scorebuilders Physical Therapy Content Master is the exclusive property of Scorebuilders. No part of this publication may be reproduced or transmitted in any form, without the express written consent of Scorebuilders.

reviews.title: Regretful
reviews.comment: I had this on my iPhone which I replaced with an android based device so I ended up buying this app twice and I sincerely regret it. The information is solid in some places but is blatantly wrong in others, ex. A spinal cord injury is listed as a LMN disorder. There are also spelling and grammatical errors as others have mentioned. The questions and content are not nearly as thorough as the OSullivan NPTE prep guide which is what I would recommend to anyone serious about passing their boards.
reviews.author: Zach Sedino

reviews.title: Absolutely love this app!
reviews.comment: It breaks the information down so that it is easy to understand. It\'s easy to study anywhere.
reviews.author: Denese Hunter

reviews.title: Trouble with seeing all answers
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, but on the particular phone I have (Sprint Samsung phone) I am unable to read the bottom multiple choice answer, so I don\'t get to see all the options. Be careful when buying this, your screen may not work with the format of the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When reviewing the questions, the rationale doesnt give any explanation of the correct answer, it repeats the question instead. Please fix!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: search option...
reviews.comment: great info.  diagrams could be helpful at times but really all it needs is that search option.  will give 5 stars after update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t buy
reviews.comment: Way over priced! I have found multiple errors within the content.
reviews.author: Joe Pratt

reviews.comment: Fixed problems fast. Great study tool.
